definition: to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: As it is going to rain, let's stop working.
sentences.chinese: 快下雨了，讓我們歇手吧。

definition: to give up/to abandon (a goal etc)/to let sth go/forget it/let the matter drop
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired/spent
spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
to shy away from work/to get by without attending duty
to have no alternative/to be helpless
lit. to beat a drowning dog (idiom)/fig. to pulverize an (already defeated) enemy/to hit sb when he's down
to gather one's spirits/to pull oneself together
to make a living doing manual labor/to give sth all one's got
